comment: Happy National ! With all that our Nurses have gone through this last year, this celebration is unlike any other. To all our Nurses, we THANK YOU for who you are and what you do! Please watch and share this tribute to Nurses!
amr:
# ::snt Happy National ! With all that our Nurses have gone through this last year, this celebration is unlike any other. To all our Nurses, we THANK YOU for who you are and what you do! Please watch and share this tribute to Nurses!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :mode expressive
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "National")
            :ARG1-of (h / happy-01))
      :snt2 (r / resemble-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c / celebrate-02
                  :mod (t / this))
            :ARG2 (c2 / celebrate-02
                  :mod (o / other)
                  :mod (t2 / this))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (g / go-through-20
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (n2 / nurse-01)
                              :poss (w / we)
                              :mod (a / all))
                        :ARG1 (y / year
                              :mod (l / last)))))
      :snt3 (t3 / thank-01
            :ARG0 w
            :ARG1 (y2 / you
                  :mod (a2 / all)
                  :ARG0-of (n3 / nurse-01))
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p3 / person
                        :domain y2)
                  :op2 (t4 / thing
                        :ARG1-of (d / do-02
                              :ARG0 y2))))
      :snt4 a3
      :op1 (w2 / watch-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 y2
            :ARG1 (t5 / tribute
                  :mod (t6 / this)))
      :op2 (s / share-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 y2
            :ARG1 t5))
